features.Resolution: WQXGA (2560x1600), IPS 500nits Anti-glare, 100% DCI-P3, 240Hz, DisplayHDR™ 400, Dolby® Vision®, G-SYNC®, Low Blue Light, High Gaming Performance
features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4080 12GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2280MHz, TGP 175W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3306 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, audio by HARMAN, optimized with Nahimic Audio, Smart Amplifier (AMP)
features.USB Ports: 1x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), Always On, and 3x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1)
features.USB-C Ports: 1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with Lenovo® PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4, and 1x USB-C® (Thunderbolt™ 4 / USB4® 40Gbps), with DisplayPort™ 1.4
